ch0025_40_suzuna/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, you’re here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Are you focused today?
ch0025_40_suzuna/0101_0701_02_10:
Before you go out on an adventure, why don’t you
give my homemade food a try?
ch0025_40_suzuna/7101_0701_01_10: I make a lot of chilled dishes...
ch0025_40_suzuna/7101_0701_02_10: but when you eat them, they’ll warm your heart!
ch0025_40_suzuna/7101_0701_03_10:
It’s because I put so much thought into my dishes,
hoping everyone enjoys them!
ch0025_40_suzuna/7102_0701_01_10:
My Darmanitan is usually coolheaded, but once
she gets angry, it’s tough to calm her down.
ch0025_40_suzuna/7102_0701_02_10:
She can get really aggressive and won’t stop
spewing flames, even if her body starts to melt!
ch0025_40_suzuna/7102_0701_03_10:
She’s cool and calm on the surface but hides a
fiery heart underneath!
ch0025_40_suzuna/7103_0701_01_10:
I am way more focused when I cook wearing
fancy clothes!
ch0025_40_suzuna/7103_0701_02_10: I’ll make food that’s just as stunning as my outfit!
ch0025_40_suzuna/7104_0701_01_10:
When you’re trying to find the right gift, trust your
intuition and choose what catches your eye.
ch0025_40_suzuna/7104_0701_02_10:
If you overthink it, you’ll get confused and won’t
know what’s best...
ch0025_40_suzuna/7104_0701_03_10:
If you believe that the person will like your gift,
it’ll work out...I think!
ch0025_40_suzuna/7105_0701_01_10:
Maylene is a growing girl, so when I cook for her,
she eats a lot!
ch0025_40_suzuna/7105_0701_03_10: Well, you can eat a lot of my food if you want!
ch0025_40_suzuna/1701_0701_01_10: I have a gift for you!
ch0025_40_suzuna/1701_0701_02_10:
I hope you receive the same energy and focus that
I have!
ch0025_40_suzuna/1701_0702_01_10: I’ll be really satisfied if it makes you happy!
ch0025_40_suzuna/2501_0701_01_10:
Why does eating ice cream in a warm room on a
cold day...
ch0025_40_suzuna/2501_0701_02_10:
taste so much better than eating ice cream on a
hot day?
ch0025_40_suzuna/2501_0701_03_10:
You wouldn’t happen to know why, would you?
I can’t stop thinking about it...
ch0025_40_suzuna/2501_0702_01_10: Now my brain feels hot from all this thinking!
ch0025_40_suzuna/2501_0702_02_10: Let’s eat ice cream and cool down!
ch0025_40_suzuna/2511_0701_01_10:
I’m trying out different accessories with this outfit
to see what matches!
ch0025_40_suzuna/2511_0701_02_10:
Some stuff looks perfect with it, but others didn’t
make the cut...
ch0025_40_suzuna/2511_0701_03_10: Fashion can be tough, but it’s also fun!
ch0025_40_suzuna/2511_0702_01_10:
Whether we’re talking about Pokémon battles,
cooking, or fashion, experience is important!
ch0025_40_suzuna/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m gonna stay totally focused until I max out my
experience points in fashion!
ch0025_40_suzuna/3001_0701_01_10:
I made breakfast! Why don’t you start your day off
with an energy boost?
ch0025_40_suzuna/3003_0701_01_10:
Eat this and cool down! Frozen desserts are great
when you’ve been active and you’re
feeling warm!
ch0025_40_suzuna/3005_0701_01_10:
You can accomplish plenty at night if you focus.
But don’t push yourself too hard, OK?
